item.title: About maven dependency type 'bundle'
item.description: Earlier this week my build failed because maven was not able to resolve an (indirect) dependency on some package. It took me a while to notice that the dependency node in the pom file had an extra attribute: type = bundle. It only took a couple of minutes to find a good explanation here. Build fixed ðŸ˜‰
